title: Associate Software Engineer
description: Migrated 20+ client APIs from APIGEE to AWS API Gateway + Lambda (Golang), reducing latency by ~25%. Built internal AI-powered chat app using RAG and MCP. Managed cloud infrastructure with Terraform and established disaster recovery for 5+ microservices.

title: Software Engineer Intern
description: Developed 20+ RESTful APIs using Spring Boot with Spring Batch. Built CI/CD pipelines with Jenkins for AWS ECS microservices, integrating SonarQube, Veracode, and Wiz. Created Splunk and Dynatrace dashboards for monitoring.

title: Junior Developer
description: Developed ReactJS web solutions for KMIT, NGIT, and KMEC institutions, including modules for attendance, exam results, and live classroom video streaming.
